title: Pressure
question: 哪个是压力的公式？
A: Pressure = Force × Area / Tekanan = Daya × Luas
B: Pressure = Force ÷ Area / Tekanan = Daya ÷ Luas
C: Pressure = Area ÷ Force / Tekanan = Luas ÷ Daya
D: Pressure = Mass × Gravity / Tekanan = Jisim × Graviti

question: Factors that affect air pressure / Faktor-faktor yang mempengaruhi tekanan udara
Volume / Isi padu 变大 会导致 Air pressure / Tekanan uadara
Volume / Isi padu 变小 会导致 Air pressure / Tekanan uadara
Temperature / Suhu 增加 会导致 Air pressure / Tekanan uadara
Temperature / Suhu 减少 会导致 Air pressure / Tekanan uadara
